subject: RE: [junit] testing switch statements in method
msgSnippet: ... I m not Joe, but personally I don t believe in that s not an option . Often it s quite interesting to see how alternatives pop out of the nowhere once the
messageBody:
> I think Kamal made it clear that changing the API was not an
> option

I'm not Joe, but personally I don't believe in "that's not an option".

Often it's quite interesting to see how alternatives pop out of the nowhere
once the actual costs of the "only available options" become apparent to the
decision makers.

Cheers, Ilja
